law.catch_line: Within 30 days after a fundraiser conducted under this part, the organization that received the perm...
law.text:
Within 30 days after a fundraiser conducted under this part, the organization that received the permit for the fundraiser shall submit to the county commissioners:
an accounting of all funds received or pledged;
an accounting of all expenses paid or incurred; and
a statement under oath of the application of the net profits.
